nodes.text: President of the Imperial Senate was a political title during the early stages of the Galactic Civil War, prior to the Dissolution of the Imperial Senate. As indicated by the title's name, the person holding the title was in charge of the Imperial Senate. He was in charge of authorizing citizens of the Galactic Empire passports allowing them unhindered access throughout all spaceports and star systems.

The President of the Imperial Senate was a title mentioned in the opening statement in The Star Wars Intergalactic Passport. It is unclear whether the title had any relation to the Galactic Emperor, who at least officially had been advised by the Imperial Senate.
